job_description: This position is limited to students that are registered in a recognized Co-op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or University Role Description:The 7705 Service Aggregation Router Technical Expertise Centre (TEC) is seeking a highly motivated and technically astute individual to join our team to provide global technical support to teams around the world. Technical SupportInterfaces to regional TACs (Technical Assistance Centers), Customer Account Teams, other Business   Units, R&D, and Product Management for technical consultation and customer support concerns.Debugs complex customer issues by applying both established troubleshooting procedures and creative alternatives.Develop internal / external web tools and scripts required to troubleshoot specific customer issues.Prepares and maintains problem reports encountered and methods of resolution ensuring overall system integrity and reliability. New Product IntroductionDevelopment of New Product/Feature Introduction Training Material, Configuration Notes, and Knowledge base Articles.Interfacing with the Development team to gain an understanding of new features/products Global Network Engineering SupportAssisting the GNE team to stage/test customer networksProvide specific customer training on recently designed or redesigned networks
job_requirements: Qualifications:3rd year+ co-op student registered in a recognized Co-Op or Intern Program at a Canadian College or UniversityComputer Science, Electrical, Computer or Software Engineering.   Essential:The ideal candidate has some or all of the following qualities:Excellent communication skills and the ability to work well in a close-knit teamExcellent troubleshooting skillsUnderstanding of IP and MPLS networkingUnderstanding of network management concepts and basic protocols (e.g. SNMP, DHCP).  Alcatel-Lucent Canada is committed to building a skilled, diverse workforce reflective of Canadian society. As a result, we promote employment equity and encourage women, Aboriginal persons, persons with a disability and persons of a visible minority group to apply.Open To All Majors:No
